classes.name: CryptoCertificate
classes.description: A scripting object representing a X.509 certificate.

methods.name: verify
methods.description: Verifies the Certificate was signed by a signing certificates private key.

methods.name: getValidbefore
methods.description: The certificate is valid before this date.

methods.name: getValidAfter
methods.description: The certificate is valid after this date.

methods.name: isValidOn
methods.description: Is the certificate valid based on a provided date.

classes.name: CryptoCertificateManager
classes.description: Provides methods to parse or fetch certificates.

methods.name: parseCertificatePem
methods.description: Parses a PEM encoded X.509 Certificate.

methods.name: getHttpsCertificate
methods.description: Returns array of certificates presented by an https server.

classes.name: CryptoDigest
classes.description: Provides methods to hash data with different digests.

methods.name: sha1Base64
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 160 bit SHA-1 hash.

methods.name: sha1
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 160 bit SHA-1 hash.

methods.name: md5
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 128 bit MD5 hash.

methods.name: md5Base64
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 128 bit MD5 hash.

methods.name: sha384Base64
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 384 bit SHA384 hash.

methods.name: hmacSha512
methods.description: Returns HmacSHA512 MAC for the given key and data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: hmacMd5
methods.description: Returns HmacMD5 MAC for the given key and data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: hmacSha384
methods.description: Returns HmacSHA384 MAC for the given key and data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: sha256
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 256 bit SHA256 hash.

methods.name: hmacSha256
methods.description: Returns HmacSHA256 MAC for the given key and data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: hmacSha1
methods.description: Returns HmacSHA1 MAC for the given key and data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: sha384
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 384 bit SHA384 hash.

methods.name: sha256Base64
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 256 bit SHA256 hash.

methods.name: sha512
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 512 bit SHA512 hash.

methods.name: sha512Base64
methods.description: Returns a Base64 encoded 512 bit SHA512 hash.

classes.name: CryptoEncoding
classes.description: Provides methods to encode/decode strings between different encodings.

methods.name: binaryConcatBase64
methods.description: Decodes two Base64 strings and concatenates the binary data. Returns base64 encoded result.

methods.name: base64EncodeBytes
methods.description: Base64 Encoder

methods.name: base64Encode
methods.description: Base64 Encoder.

methods.name: hexToBase64
methods.description: Hex to Base64 Encoder.

methods.name: mimeToBase64
methods.description: Extracts data from MimeAttachment as Base64.

methods.name: base64ToMime
methods.parameters: b64data: string, mimeType: string, fileName: string
methods.description: Base64 to MimeAttachment.

methods.name: base64Decode
methods.description: Base64 Decoder.

methods.name: getSubsetBase64
methods.parameters: b64data: string, start: number, end: number
methods.description: Returns a subset of bytes from a Base64 encoded string.

methods.name: base64toHex
methods.description: Base64 to Hex Encoder.

methods.name: getLengthBase64
methods.description: Decodes a Base64 String and returns the number of bytes that were encoded.

classes.name: CryptoEncryption
classes.description: Provides static methods to encrypt/decrypt data with different ciphers. All ciphers use CBC mode with PKCS5 padding.

methods.name: generateRandomBytes
methods.description: Returns a number of random bytes encoded as a Base64 string.

methods.name: tripleDesEncrypt
methods.parameters: dataB64: string, secretB64: string, ivB64: string
methods.description: 3DES Encryption. Returns encrypted data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: aesEncrypt
methods.parameters: dataB64: string, secretB64: string, ivB64: string
methods.description: AES Encryption. Returns encrypted data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: aesDecrypt
methods.parameters: encryptedB64: string, secretB64: string, ivB64: string
methods.description: AES Decryption. Returns data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: tripleDesDecrypt
methods.parameters: encryptedB64: string, secretB64: string, ivB64: string
methods.description: 3DES Decryption. Returns data Base64 encoded.

methods.name: generateRandomIv
methods.description: Returns 16 random bytes encoded as a Base64 string suitable for an AES Initialization Vector.

classes.name: CryptoRSA
classes.description: Provides static methods to encrypt / decrypt / sign data with RSA style encryption.

methods.name: encrypt
methods.description: Asymmetric RSA Encryption. Result is Base64 encoded.

methods.name: decrypt
methods.description: Asymmetric RSA Decryption. Result is Base64 encoded.

methods.name: createSignature
methods.description: Creates a RSA Signature.

methods.name: verifySignature
methods.parameters: key: string, dateB64: string, signatureB64: string
methods.description: Verifies a RSA Signature.
